itemLabel: Valerie Howarth, Baroness Howarth of Breckland

wikipedia_page.main: Valerie Georgina Howarth, Baroness Howarth of Breckland,  (born 5 September 1940) is a British politician and a member of the House of Lords, sitting as a crossbencher. She was made an OBE in the 1999 Birthday Honours, she was created a life peer on 25 June 2001 with the title Baroness Howarth of Breckland, of Parson Cross in the County of South Yorkshire. She is one of the board members of the Children and Family Court Advisory and Support Service.

response: *1940 – Valerie Howarth, Baroness Howarth of Breckland, English politician
